name: Summon Steward
description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 15% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities, each once per day.

name: Purify Soul
description: Restores 15% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

name: Soulshape
description:
Turn into a Vulpin, increasing movement speed by 30%. You may reactivate Soulshape to teleport 10 yds forward.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

name: Flicker
description: Teleports you forward 10 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

name: Fleshcraft
description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

name: Door of Shadows
description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

name: Shackle the Unworthy
description:
Admonish your target for their past transgressions, reducing the damage they deal to you by 5% and dealing (175% of Attack power) Arcane damage over 14 sec.

While Shackle the Unworthy is active on an enemy, Rune spending attacks reduce its cooldown by 4 sec.

name: Death's Due
description:
Corrupts the targeted ground, causing [(3.6036% of Attack power) * 11] Shadow damage over 10 sec to targets within the area.

Enemies damaged deal 1% reduced damage to you, up to a maximum of 15% and their power is transferred to you as an equal amount of Strength.

While you remain within the area, your 

<condition>Necrotic Strike</condition>
<dynamic>Necrotic Strike and</dynamic>

<spec>Blood</spec>
<dynamic>Heart Strike will hit up to 0 additional targets</dynamic>

<condition>Clawing Shadows</condition>
<dynamic>Clawing Shadows will hit all enemies near the target</dynamic>

Scourge Strike will hit all enemies near the target.

name: Abomination Limb
description: Sprout an additional limb for 12 sec. Every 1 sec, it deals (22.5% of Attack power) Shadow damage to all nearby enemies and pulls an enemy to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you.

name: Swarming Mist
description:
A heavy mist surrounds you for 8 sec, increasing your Dodge by 10%. 

Deals (20% of Attack power) Shadow damage every 1 sec to enemies within 10 yds. Every time it deals damage you gain 3 Runic Power, up to a maximum of (30 / 10 * 5) Runic Power.
